title: Group of 30 T202 end panels, discounts for larger purchases
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: Group of 30 T202 end panels, discounts for larger purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the following T202 Hassan end panel cards (separated from the original T202 Triplefolder) available for purchase. Shipping will be $3.00. Accepting Paypal only. 

Looking to sell these, so I am offering the following discounts for larger purchases: Buy 2 or more cards, free shipping, 4 or more cards, 10% off, buy 10 or more, 15% off.  Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely in a padded envelope.

Brian
